duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for providing outstanding patient care and accurate dosimetry services.
Utilize Varian TrueBeam equipment, Eclipse planning, and ARIA software to create precise and effective radiation treatment plans.
Developing radiation treatment plans including 3D, IMRT, IGRT, VMAT, SRS, SBRT, Hyperarc, Radformation, Autocontouring and Clearcheck.
Interpret complex medical documents and assess and create the most effective treatment plans for patients based on these documents.
Work effectively with patients, medical professionals, and colleagues, and ability to adapt to new environments and work autonomously while on assignment.

education_certification.credential: Certified Medical Dosimetrist (CMD) with a valid license to practice, ideally in Michigan. Bachelor's degree in Health Care or related field (Master's preferred)
